items.sentence: I don't see anything wrong with your premise.
I admire the way you can always stay so calm.
I admire your determination to master French.

Tom was still in bed when I got to his place.
Tom asked Mary to marry him, and she refused.
I'd never seen a panda until I went to China.
I missed the train. I should've come earlier.
I've read every book in my father's bookcase.
I think that I could do that better than you.

Our school has a gym but not a swimming pool.

Bungee jumping isn\'t as much fun as it looks.
Let me know immediately if you have a problem.

Imagination affects every aspect of our lives.

Is Tom still planning to go to Boston with us?
I\'ve been thinking about the meaning of life.

If I start eating potato chips, I can\'t stop.

Tom always crosses his t\'s and dots his i\'s.

I\'m not sure that that\'s what Tom has to do.
